title: Donation as a precondition, for impact
text: Consumers/audiences as in individuals/communities and producers that initiate those expressions for their demands decide how and where impact will be delivered. There will be no price-tags; especially on people, as in market-place like platforms whatsoever, period.

section.title: Temporal scope of impact
section.content: By giving a time period ahead, aka. demand-on-air; audiecences would be able to decide until when their potential impact will stand.

section.title: Spatial scope of impact
section.content: A local impact that have been bypassed in each purchase as is, could be made by reserving a percentage for the local causes to benefit from.
